attributes.action: Make ALL doctor`s surgeries stop using revenue earning telephone numbers - 0844 earns THEM our money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Doctors surgeries are earning money each time you phone 0844.

This is outrageous.  Please contact your M. P. 

The sick are paying twice to call a surgery and the doctors and their handlers are smug and uncaring.

5p a minute, 10p call box, 5 times that on a mobile. Yet 0844 numbers are not included in your call package.  

You pay extra and earn the surgery money every minute of every call.

Please support the campaign, lobby your m p.  fight for a return to 01 numbers.

google 0844 and see for yourselves

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
